org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.builder.api

接口 FilterableComponentBuilder<T extends ComponentBuilder<T>>

  • 所有超级接口:
    Builder<Component>, ComponentBuilder<T>
    所有已知子接口:
    AppenderComponentBuilder, AppenderRefComponentBuilder, CompositeFilterComponentBuilder, LoggableComponentBuilder<T>, LoggerComponentBuilder, RootLoggerComponentBuilder

    public interface FilterableComponentBuilder<T extends ComponentBuilder<T>>
extends ComponentBuilder<T>
    Component builder that can add Filters. Similar in idea to the Filterable.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.6

      Adds a Filter to the component.

      • add

        T add(FilterComponentBuilder assembler)
        Adds a Filter to the component.
        参数:
        assembler - The FilterComponentBuilder with all of its attributes and sub components set.
        返回:
        this Assembler.
